name: 九域异传(金乌劫)
description:
Nine Territories Legends-the Sun Disaster is a single player card game of Roguelike based on the story -ten Suns coming out together in the Overseas West Classic Chapter of the Shan Hai Classic. The game innovatively incorporates board elements into itself, bringing new fun and intellectual challenges to the card play.

During the reign of the Emperor Yao, a strange phenomenon appeared in the sky, ten suns coming out together, and the world suffered a severe drought. All kinds of ferocious beasts took advantage of the opportunity to come out of their nests, bringing disasters to the world where people were struggling and casualties were extremely heavy. The Sacrifice Personnel-Nüchou(a person name, from the Shan Hai Classic) deduced and learned that currently the seal of the five elements must be broken before the power of the sun can be weakened. All the clans were ordered to save the world from fire and water. But the truth is revealed in the end...


·A strategy game based on deck construction and board elimination
·The innovative board mode brings new fun and challenges to the card play
·The Roguelike card library construction contains multi-characters and multi-genres
·The unique block combination and revenue bonus system
·Free and rich explorations of random events


·The main five-act levels provides 20+ hours of play time
·Two heroes, six starter decks
·36 monsters with different skills and attributes
·More than 150 cards with different effects
·Nearly 100 props and items
·22 random events


·The story will be enriched
·More Hero choices
·More game modes development
·Creative workshop will be added
